definition: character set (e.g. ASCII 美國資訊交換標準碼|美国资讯交换标准码 or Unicode 統一碼|统一码)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Display charset. The character set used for screen display
sentences.chinese: 用于屏幕显示的字符集。

sentences.english: There are 8-bit character sets and 16-bit character sets.
sentences.chinese: 现在有8位和16位两种字符集。

sentences.english: Character set conversion is performed if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 如有必要，执行字符集转换。

sentences.english: Default charset in which to display messages.
sentences.chinese: 显示信件的默认字符集。

sentences.english: Default charset in which to compose messages.
sentences.chinese: 编写信件的默认字符集。

sentences.english: The output charset is not appropriate for the characters to display properly.
sentences.chinese: 输出字符集不适合用于正确显示字符。

sentences.english: Installing the fonts and character set used in the source document can solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 安装源文档中使用的字体和字符集可以解决此问题。

sentences.english: Use single-byte character sets if you can.
sentences.chinese: 尽量使用单字节的字符集。

sentences.english: Communications are supported in any language, including double-byte character sets, such as Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 通信支持任何语言，包括双字节字符集，如中国。

sentences.english: The code page for the windows variant of the Latin1 character set.
sentences.chinese: 这一页使用拉丁字符集定义了窗体变量。

sentences.english: Optional parameters may include information such as character set encoding or language.
sentences.chinese: 可选参数可能包含诸如字符集编码或语言等信息。

sentences.english: Further keyboard mappings for other character sets can be added.
sentences.chinese: 还可以增加针对其他字符集的键盘映射。

sentences.english: This character set can be repeated in several code pages.
sentences.chinese: 该字符集可以在多个代码页中重复。

sentences.english: In the drop-down list at the top, you can select a character-set.
sentences.chinese: 在顶部的下拉菜单中，你可以选择字符集。

sentences.english: Character set conversion into the database code page is performed if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 如有必要，执行字符集到数据库代码页的转换。
